email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel's specifications and any additional terms? Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, built in 2018, and fully compliant with all regulations. Given the current market, the best I can do is $48.50 per ton. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 is still a bit steep for us. How about $47.00? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? We need to finalize the details soon. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can meet you at $47.50 per ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you, and I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $47.50 and $15,000 demurrage works for us. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. Looking forward to finalizing this. Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll prepare the charter party agreement and send it over for your review by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, Sarah
